snippet: For years Tom Watson has led the push to investigate Britain’s freewheeling tabloids, especially Rupert Murdoch’s papers, and now the scrutiny is yielding prosecutions.
abstract: The Saturday Profile; British Parliament member Tom Watson has for years led the push to investigate Britain’s freewheeling tabloids, especially Rupert Murdoch’s papers, and now the scrutiny is yielding prosecutions at News International; Watson expects that the phone hacking will prove to be the tip of the iceberg, with more evidence emerging of computer hacking.
lead_paragraph: For years Tom Watson has led the push to investigate Britain’s freewheeling tabloids, especially Rupert Murdoch’s papers, and now the scrutiny is yielding prosecutions.

headline.seo: Tom Watson’s Phone Hacking Scandal Triumphs
headline.main: The British Lawmaker Nipping at Tabloids’ Heels
headline.print_headline: The British Lawmaker Nipping at Tabloids’ Heels

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
